title: Full Scale Attack
body:
Full Scale Attack

Deep within the wilderness of Ravenhurst City, near the area of Inferno Dungeon.....

Four S rank hunters were sitting inside a room with dark expressions on their faces. The air inside the room was sometimes trembling due to the aura they were emitting, and the atmosphere inside the room was extremely solemn.

The four hunters were the higher-ups of the Dark Guild. Elijah, Xavier, Sera and Nate.

"We need to do something," Elijah said in a furious voice.

"I agree. Those bastards are openly attacking all our bases. We can't just sit back and do nothing." Xavier nodded his head in agreement hearing Elijah.

Before leaving Astarte City, Evan had told Sebastian the locations of the Dark Guild's bases.

Sebastian shared the locations of these bases with the authorities of other cities, and they destroyed many bases of the Dark Guild in the past twenty days.
